summary: AFTER AIR BAG RECALL WAS PERFORMED, THE WARNING CHIME SOUNDED AS THE DOME LIGHTS CAME ON.  CONSUMER FELT DEFECT IS RELATED TO RECALL WORK PERFORMED.  WHILE DRIVING AT NIGHT, AND USING THE MULTIPURPOSE SWITCH TO GO FROM BRIGHT HIGH BEAM TO NORMAL HEADLIGHTS, THE HEADLIGHTS SUDDENLY WENT DARK.   THE SEAT BELT RETRACTOR FAILED.   *TT   *NLM
